dimensions: Warp (serged top and bottom) x Weft (selvedge both sides): 145 x 96.5 cm (57 1/16 x 38 in.)
title: Les Travaux de la Manufacture
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave
description: 1936 reproduction of a French design of 1783 drawn by Jean Baptiste Huet and printed by the Oberkampf factory at Jouy and showing fifteen processes in the manufacture of printed cottons. Printed in green on off-white.
name: Reproduction textile
